Components.BasicHybridEditor

Class CBasicHybridEditorComp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Components.BasicHybridEditor.CBasicHybridEditorComp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicHybridEditorComp, INodeObject, IPAMOJAComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CBasicHybridEditorComp
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements INodeObject, java.io.Serializable, IBasicHybridEditorComp, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    A composite component with facilities for constructing well-formed program texts and their corresponding abstract syntax tree representations by using both text and structure modes of operation.

    A BasicHybridEditor component consists of an assembly of CoreHybridEditor, Text2AST, AST2Text, SyntaxHighlighter and PanelTreeView PAMOJA subcomponents. It observes both a language and a presentation component, and maintains consistency between its language specifications and that of the former, and between its presentation style and that of the later. In addition, it makes use of a node factory tool to generate the different kinds of language-specific nodes of an AST.

    See Also:
    CCoreHybridEditorComp, CText2ASTComp, CAST2TextComp, CSyntaxHighlighterComp, CPanelTreeComp, Serialized Form

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
        Handle property change events from Language and Presentation Components. If the property change is from:
        • Language - retrieve the Language object and pass on its value to the subcomponents.
        • Presentation - retrieve the Presentation object and pass its value to presentation-enabled subcomponents.
        Specified by:
        propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
        Parameters:
        evt - event object with the new value
